data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Balasubramanian, Chellaiah, Muthukatturaja, Marimuthu (2019): A new mayfly Thraulus species (Ephemeroptera: Leptophlebiidae) from Peninsular India. Zootaxa 4638 (1): 136-142, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4638.1.7|2 occurrences
